arts.ttl: Carlisle United coach has left club, Hughes reveals
arts.sum: Carlisle United head of performance Toby Frost has left the Blues, it has been confirmed.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS: How did Carlisle United fare against Barrow?
arts.sum: How did we rate the players as Carlisle United picked up an important win over Barrow at Holker Street?

arts.ttl: Dennis earns Carlisle United crucial derby win against Barrow
arts.sum: Barrow 0 Carlisle United 1: Matt Dennis was Carlisle United's hero as the Blues earned a crucial derby win against Barrow.

arts.ttl: Matthew Dennis boosts Carlisle’s survival hopes with deciding goal in derby
arts.sum: Mark Hughes’ men won at Barrow on Thursday night.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United owner stresses family's commitment amid relegation fight
arts.sum: Tom Piatak has stressed his family’s long-term commitment to Carlisle United – and said the Blues will always be in “strong” shape under their ownership.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United owner Tom Piatak on Blues' struggles, decisions and plans
arts.sum: INTERVIEW: Carlisle United owner Tom Piatak talks to the News & Star about the season of struggle, big decisions and much more.

arts.ttl: Barrow boss wants to end poor record against Carlisle United
arts.sum: Barrow AFC head coach Andy Whing says his side are determined to end their poor record against Carlisle United tonight.

arts.ttl: Six of the best...Carlisle United wins against Barrow!
arts.sum: Ahead of Thursday's trip to Holker Street, can Carlisle United take inspiration from some of their best wins over the Bluebirds?
A series of Carlisle United fans and volunteers have been recognised as EFL “community heroes”.

arts.ttl: Hughes issues "no negativity" demand to big Carlisle United squad
arts.sum: Mark Hughes insists his Carlisle United players are responding in the right way to his demand for no “negativity” among the squad.
